reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 20/15: COMPULSORY AND VOLUNTARY TRADES
reg_info.act_under: Ontario College of Trades and Apprenticeship Act, 2009

content.content: 1. (1) The review panel decision set out in the report “Trade Classification Review: Sprinkler and Fire Protection Installer, TCR2013-1 SFPI”, dated April 23, 2014, provides that the period of repose for the reclassification of the trade is two years. (2) The trade of Sprinkler and Fire Protection Installer is prescribed as a compulsory trade, pursuant to the review panel decision mentioned in subsection (1).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The review panel decision set out in the report “Trade Classification Review: Sprinkler and Fire Protection Installer, TCR2013-1 SFPI”, dated April 23, 2014, provides that the period of repose for the reclassification of the trade is two years.

(2) The trade of Sprinkler and Fire Protection Installer is prescribed as a compulsory trade, pursuant to the review panel decision mentioned in subsection (1).

content.section: Compulsory trades, s. 91 of the Act
content.content: 2. Ontario Regulation 175/11 (Prescribed Trades and Related Matters), made under the Act, sets out the trades that, for the purposes of section 91 of the Act, were designated as compulsory trades before section 61 of the Act came into force. Voluntary Trades
content.raw_html:
2. Ontario Regulation 175/11 (Prescribed Trades and Related Matters), made under the Act, sets out the trades that, for the purposes of section 91 of the Act, were designated as compulsory trades before section 61 of the Act came into force.

Voluntary Trades

content.section: Voluntary trades, s. 91 of the Act
content.content: 3. Ontario Regulation 175/11 (Prescribed Trades and Related Matters), made under the Act, sets out the trades that, for the purposes of section 91 of the Act, were designated as voluntary trades before section 61 of the Act came into force.
content.raw_html: 3. Ontario Regulation 175/11 (Prescribed Trades and Related Matters), made under the Act, sets out the trades that, for the purposes of section 91 of the Act, were designated as voluntary trades before section 61 of the Act came into force.

content.section: Voluntary trades, s. 91 of the Act
content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).

content.section: Voluntary trades, s. 91 of the Act
